channel.title: Recommended Armour sets
channel.description:
:D Hello everyone i have some recommended armour sets here for you's Here they are If you have suggestions tell me i'll happily add them
Armadyl robe set...
Armadyl robe top, Armadyl robe, Armadyl robe legs, Zamorak's Unholy book, Staff of light, White boots, White gloves, And Completionist cape with colors changed to white and cyan.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2mln5v3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lVs95zc.jpg[/img]
Dragonbone set
Dragonbone Platebody, Dragonbone Platelegs, Dragonbone Boots, Dragonbone Gloves, Dragonbone Mage hat, Arcane stream necklace, Torag's hammers, and Tokhaar-Kal
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gVzSLCa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mHbcpEK.jpg[/img]
Ganodermic Visor Ganodermic Poncho, Ganodermic Leggings, White Gloves, White boots, Amulet of Ranging, Tokhaar-Kal
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dvASbRk.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QmPPBKy.jpg[/img]

item.title: Recommended Armour sets
item.dc:creator: @Zekinumz Zekinumz
item.description:
@Zekinumz wrote:

the cape to the dragonbone is Tokhaar-Kal sorry i forgot :palm:

Read full topic
